title: History-Based STEAM Maker Game Design Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational history education, STEAM education theories, digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for pre-service teachers to develop the ability to design and evaluate game-based pedagogical methods in mobile environments

learning_goals: Students can describe three or more instructional design frameworks for STEAM maker games that reflect historical context.
Students can develop at least one game-based learning scenario combining collaborative/competitive elements in a mobile environment.
Students can design maker activities that implement the scientific principles of historical inventions using digital fabrication tools.
Students can develop game-based learning assessment rubrics and analyze summative evaluation data.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
